title: Essence of life
brief_description: Explains and illustrates the main characteristics of a living organism - the ability to reproduce its own species, response to stimuli, movement and metabolism. Studies different forms of life developed on earth as conditions altered, from fresh water to dry land - fish, amphibia, birds, insects, animals and plants.
